title: Why Trump's rewriting of reality on jobs numbers could backfire
description: Analysis of how the president’s attacks on the Bureau of Labor Statistics commissioner may erode public trust and prompt political backlash.

title: Texas Democrats leave state to block vote on GOP‑drawn congressional map
description: Democratic lawmakers from Texas traveled to Illinois to deny Republicans the quorum needed to pass a new congressional map.

title: Republicans are (quietly) making 2028 moves
description: An analysis of early maneuvering by potential Republican candidates ahead of the 2028 U.S. presidential election.
